altername_name: ソニックと暗黒の騎士
name: Sonic and the Black Knight
overview: Join the Arthurian Legend and fight in a brand new quest...are you worthy? Whe the Black Knight begins terrorising King Arthur's Camelot, Sonic and friends suit up in armour to save the enchanted kingdom. Armed whit a legendary sword, Sonic discovers what it means to be a true knight. -Wield a legendary, mighty sword. -Battle against up to three friends. -Explore King Arthur's world.
